trans-unit.source: Represents an expression that creates a new instance of a type.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression> can be used to represent an expression that creates an instance of a type.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression.CreateType%2A> property specifies the data type to create a new instance of.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression.Parameters%2A> property specifies the parameters to pass to the constructor of the type to create a new instance of.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression"></xref> class using the specified type and parameters.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type of the object to create.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> objects that indicates the parameters to use to create the object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression"></xref> class using the specified type and parameters.
The name of the data type of object to create.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> objects that indicates the parameters to use to create the object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression"></xref> class using the specified type and parameters.
The data type of the object to create.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> objects that indicates the parameters to use to create the object.
Gets or sets the data type of the object to create.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> to the data type of the object to create.
Gets or sets the parameters to use in creating the object.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection"></xref> that indicates the parameters to use when creating the object.
